author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
Adding a new key for upgrade 2023 MC simulation with realistic (i.e. run2 asymptotic) conditions + HL-LHC reco beamspot.
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## Upgrade
- **Phase|I realistic scenario** : [81X_upgrade2023_realistic_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2023_realistic_v0) as [81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v12) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v8/81X_upgrade2023_realistic_v0): 
  - added HL-LHC beamspot from the TP (`Realistic14TeVCollisions_2023Muon_HLLHCBS_mc`)
title: adding key for phase2 upgrade2023 MC simulation
